newsitem.title: USA: Belmont Homes CEO Jerold Kennedy ill.
newsitem.headline: Belmont Homes CEO Jerold Kennedy ill.

text.p: Belmont Homes Inc said President and Chief Executive Officer Jerold Kennedy was recently diagnosed with a small cancerous lung tumor, but the prognosis for remission was excellent.
Physicians said the growth was detected at an early stage and there was no indication it had spread, Belmont said.
Management said there would be little change in Kennedy's day-to-day involvement at the office.
Prognosis for complete remission of the cancer was excellent, the company said, adding Kennedy was expected to miss little time from the office during his chemotherapy.
